name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Faxjar - Send a fax now (no ads or signups)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send a fax online right inside your web browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Faxjar is a secure and fast way to send fax from your computer or smart phone. 

No registration!
No advertisements!
No subscriptions!

Send a fax in three simple steps:

1. Upload your documents (PDF, JPG, PNG, TIFF, or HTML)
2. Choose destination country and enter the destination fax number.
3. Pay with Paypal.

Faxjar is a secure fax provider.
